title: Server issues
body: So tired of getting 400 ping, or having ping spikes, or "attempting to reconnect", please work on your servers and make them less laggy and annoying.  And no, it's not my internet, because I have full bars and I'm talking to people in Skype while this lag and dc'ing is happening now

replies.body:
I looked into this and haven't found any recorded service issues. The *attempting to reconnect* message is usually an indication of packet loss or high packet latency. Because different servers are in different geolocations, it's possible to have a good connection to one but not another. For this reason, this is likely caused by issues along your route to the server. As a first step, though, we'll need to ensure your local network settings are up to spec with our [connection guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
